name: TheTube
description:
Watch videos on this new social network. Pause and platform throught them. In the videos you can find cool things like cars and boxes. But don't worry, theTube has a really not anoying helper for you "theTube" that helps you. 

Also this company totally doesn't steal your personal info.

Tutorial:

You stop the video with "spacebar" and change it wit a slider at the bottom.

You can control the player when the time is stopped, and you do so with "A" (left) "D" (right) and "W" (jump).

When the time is not stopped, you can control the car with "A" and "D".

Team:

mykaka-art;

The grey cat-programming
